Installation Guide

Instrukt is not yet available on package managers. To install it, you can install it from the source code or download the pre-built pacakges.

Minimum requirements

  • python 3.9 or newer

  • a modern terminal emulator (e.g. alacritty, kitty, st, urxvt, xterm)

Installing from source

  • Clone the repository

  • Make sure you are using the latest pip pip install -U pip If the installation fails with the package chromadb it means your pip version is old.

  • Install poetry with pip install poetry

  • Install the dependencies with:

    poetry install -E tools -E loaders

Extra Dependencies

  • xsel or xclip for copying messages to the clipboard.

  • libmagic (file type detection)

  • sqlite (for caching)

  • docker: optional for Patreons with access to the docker agent preview.
